channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: For the first time in 35 years, NPR's Hanukkah Lights will be without Susan Stamberg
item.description: This is the first Hanukkah that Murray Horwitz will not be joined by the late Susan Stamberg on NPR's holiday special Hanukkah Lights. We talk with him about their 35 years of making the show.
item.content:encoded: This is the first Hanukkah that Murray Horwitz will not be joined by the late Susan Stamberg on NPR's holiday special Hanukkah Lights. We talk with him about their 35 years of making the show.
item.dc:creator: Murray Horwitz

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 sweeps The Game Awards — analysis and full winners list
item.description: Independent video game Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept the Game Awards last night. The L.A. ceremony draws millions of views for its industry honors and exclusive previews of upcoming games.
item.content:encoded:
Independent video game Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept the Game Awards last night. The L.A. ceremony draws millions of views for its industry honors and exclusive previews of upcoming games.

(Image credit: Frank Micelotta/Picturegroup)
item.dc:creator: James Perkins Mastromarino

item.title: There's a 'Dead Man' in church in this snarky 'Knives Out' mystery
item.description: A firebrand fundamentalist is stabbed to death at church in Rian Johnson's new film, Wake Up Dead Man. This over-the-top whodunit uses mystery conventions to open up a spiritual inquiry.
item.content:encoded:
Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery.'/>

A firebrand fundamentalist is stabbed to death at church in Rian Johnson's new film, Wake Up Dead Man. This over-the-top whodunit uses mystery conventions to open up a spiritual inquiry.

(Image credit: John Wilson)
item.dc:creator: Justin Chang

item.title: Remembering world-renowned architect Frank Gehry
item.description: Gehry, who died Dec. 5, designed the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain, and the Disney Concert Hall in LA. His work has been likened to sculptures rather than buildings. Originally broadcast in 2004.
item.content:encoded: Gehry, who died Dec. 5, designed the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain, and the Disney Concert Hall in LA. His work has been likened to sculptures rather than buildings. Originally broadcast in 2004.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: If the holidays are stressing you out, remember: everything is optional
item.description: Managing a full December calendar can quickly take you from festive to frazzled. Psychotherapist Niro Feliciano shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.
item.content:encoded:
All is Calmish: How to Feel Less Frantic and More Festive During the Holidays, shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.'/>

Managing a full December calendar can quickly take you from festive to frazzled. Psychotherapist Niro Feliciano shares advice on reducing stress and increasing joy this season.

(Image credit: Julia Neroznak)
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: CNN has endured turmoil for years. Now Trump wants role in its fate
item.description: In the corporate battle over parent company Warner Bros. Discovery, CNN's fate remains up for grabs. President Trump wants a say in what happens next.
item.content:encoded:
In the corporate battle over parent company Warner Bros. Discovery, CNN's fate remains up for grabs. President Trump wants a say in what happens next.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: Here's what made it onto this year's UNESCO intangible cultural heritage list
item.description: Each year, UNESCO recognizes culturally significant practices, traditions and customs. 2025's list includes weaving, handmade paper craftsmanship, yurt making, a genre of Cuban music and yodeling.
item.content:encoded: Each year, UNESCO recognizes culturally significant practices, traditions and customs. 2025's list includes weaving, handmade paper craftsmanship, yurt making, a genre of Cuban music and yodeling.
item.dc:creator: Avery Keatley

item.title: Actor Jamie Lee Curtis talks about accepting the realities of growing older
item.description: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Actor Jamie Lee Curtis talks about accepting the realities of growing older.
item.content:encoded: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Actor Jamie Lee Curtis talks about accepting the realities of growing older.

item.title: Chop suey, a holiday classic for generations, is a dish of rich origins
item.description: Before its fall from grace, the Chinese-American dish chop suey was a holiday tradition for families who don't celebrate Christmas, even being immortalized in songs and film.
item.content:encoded: Before its fall from grace, the Chinese-American dish chop suey was a holiday tradition for families who don't celebrate Christmas, even being immortalized in songs and film.
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Forget flowers: These ancient plants attract pollinators by getting hot
item.description: While many modern plants use colorful flowers to attract pollinators, ancient palm-like plants called cycads lure them by heating up and glowing in the infrared.
item.content:encoded:
While many modern plants use colorful flowers to attract pollinators, ancient palm-like plants called cycads lure them by heating up and glowing in the infrared.

(Image credit: Michael Calonje)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce
